item.title: CemiFace: Center-based Semi-hard Synthetic Face Generation for Face Recognition
item.description: CemiFace: Generating high-quality synthetic facial data for robust face recognition, while addressing privacy concerns.

item.title: Multilinear Mixture of Experts: Scalable Expert Specialization through Factorization
item.description: Multilinear Mixture of Experts (ŒºMoE) achieves scalable expert specialization in deep neural networks through tensor factorization, enabling efficient fine-tuning and interpretable model editing.
